behaviour: It can slide 1 cell forward to an empty cell. If it has never moved, it can slide 2 cells forward to an empty cell. It can slide 1 cell diagonally-forward to a cell containing an enemy piece. If it is in the enemy en passant zone, it can slide 1 cell sideways to a cell containing an enemy pawn that first moved 1 turn ago, then 1 cell forward.
